00006 /****************************************************************************/
00007 /* RSC IDENTIFIER:  Threads
00008  *
00009  * ABSTRACT
00010  *
00011  *    The purpose of THREADS is to provide support for multithreading. 
00012  *    In order to lock a thread, a mutex can be created, locked and unlocked. 
00013  *
00014  * REUSE NOTES
00015  *
00016  *    Threads is intended for reuse by any application that requires multithreading
00017  *    support.
00018  *     
00019  *
00020  * LICENSES
00021  *
00022  *    None apply to this component.
00023  *
00024  * RESTRICTIONS
00025  *
00026  *    Threads has no restrictions.
00027  *
00028  * ENVIRONMENT
00029  *
00030  *    Threads was tested and certified in the following environments
00031  *
00032  *    1. Solaris 2.7
00033  *    2. Windows XP 
00034  *
00035  * MODIFICATIONS
00036  *
00037  *    Date              Description
00038  *    ----              -----------
00039  *    12-12-05          Original Code
00040  *
00041  */
00042 
00043 #include "DtccApi.h"
